message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product which I believe would be very valuable to you. I'm thinking of a price around $11,000. What are your thoughts?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product and am willing to pay up to $9,500 for it.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the value of this product to me is quite high. How about we meet in the middle at $10,250?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. Considering the product's value, I am willing to pay $9,750 for it.
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  While I'm aiming for a higher price, I'm willing to come down to $10,000. This is my final offer.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. Considering the product's value to me, I am willing to pay $9,800 for it.
